minor.description: Minor headlight damage - lens scratches or small cracks

moderate.description: Moderate headlight damage - cracked lens, requires replacement

severe.description: Severe headlight damage - complete assembly replacement, LED/HID damage

minor.description: Minor hood damage - small dents, surface scratches

moderate.description: Moderate hood damage - major dents, requires panel beating

severe.description: Severe hood damage - replacement required, frame damage

minor.description: Minor trunk damage - small dents, surface damage

moderate.description: Moderate trunk damage - major dents, alignment issues

severe.description: Severe trunk damage - replacement needed, latch damage

minor.description: Minor window damage - small chips, scratches

moderate.description: Moderate window damage - cracks requiring replacement

severe.description: Severe window damage - shattered, complete replacement

moderate.description: Moderate windscreen damage - crack requiring replacement

severe.description: Severe windscreen damage - shattered, ADAS calibration needed

moderate.description: Moderate bumper damage - cracks, dents, misalignment

severe.description: Severe bumper damage - replacement required, sensor damage

minor.description: Minor door damage - small dents, scratches

moderate.description: Moderate door damage - major dents, panel work needed

severe.description: Severe door damage - door skin replacement or full door replacement

minor.description: Minor fender damage - small dents, scratches

moderate.description: Moderate fender damage - major dents, creases

severe.description: Severe fender damage - replacement required, structural damage

minor.description: Minor mirror damage - glass replacement only

moderate.description: Moderate mirror damage - housing damage, paint needed

severe.description: Severe mirror damage - complete assembly replacement, power/heated features

minor.description: Minor dent or scratch - paintless dent repair, light buffing

moderate.description: Moderate dent or scratch - body filler, refinishing

severe.description: Severe dent or scratch - extensive bodywork, panel replacement consideration

minor.description: Minor grille damage - small section missing, clips damaged

moderate.description: Moderate grille damage - partial grille replacement

severe.description: Severe grille damage - complete grille assembly replacement, chrome/painted finish
